Package controller

Class AppointmentOverview

java.lang.Object
controller.AppointmentOverview
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AppointmentOverview
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Author:
Thoai Tran
This is the Appointment Overview Controller Class. This class provides the data stored for appointments from the SQL DB. This is the main menu for users to add, modify, and delete appointment records. Users are able to view by this month, this week, or show all.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize​(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      This method initializes the implementation of the AppointmentOverview method. Initializes the DB connection. Generates the table view. Lamda is used to display Current TimeZone and Current User for user reference. Property tags are set to match appointment constructor with table view columns.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - initialize
      resourceBundle - initialize.

    • generateAppointmentsTable

      private void generateAppointmentsTable()
      This method generates the appointments table view.
